content: this chunky cable crochet headband is the perfect cold weather accessory there is a photo and video tutorials included in this pattern sizes adult size 20-23 inches skill level intermediate terminology this pattern is written in standard us crochet terms in english only materials -4 mm crochet hook -size 4 yarn -yarn needle - scissors pattern copyright please do not copy redistribute or sell my pattern in any way you are more than welcome to sell your finished items you make with my patterns you may not use my pictures and pass them off as your own for they are my property thank you for your understanding
